mdRecord.dcterms:title: Disenchanted by Budd Schulberg and Harvey Breit
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for The Disenchanted, based on novel by Budd Schulberg, directed by Don Weightman. Featuring: Virginia Habermann, Robert Pastene, and Don Linahan.

Virginia
